title: Spirit Tree (Farming)/Patches

properties.name: description
properties.value: Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

content:
Spirit tree patches[edit | edit source]

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

Location Nearby activities Closest teleport Image
South-east Etceteria
Gardener: Yulf Squecks
  • Advisor Ghrim (Managing Miscellania)
  • Sea snakes
  • Bush patch
  • Ship to Rellekka
  • Ring of wealth to Miscellania
  • Fairy ring code cip
  • Enchanted lyre/Fremennik sea boots teleport, then run north to the boat
  • Rellekka house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab, then run north to the boat
East of Port Sarim
Gardener: Frizzy Skernip
  • Ship to Void Knights' Outpost
  • Ship to Entrana
    • Law Altar at Entrana
  • Ship to Great Kourend
  • Charter ship
  • Port Sarim and Rimmington shops
  • Draynor Village farming patches
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Rimmington house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
North of Brimhaven
Gardener: Praistan Ebola
  • Fruit tree patch
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Calquat tree patch
  • Charter ship (Port Sarim spot is slightly better)
  • Brimhaven house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Karamja gloves 3/4 to Shilo Village, then take the cart
  • Teleport to Ardougne and take a boat ride to Brimhaven
South-west of Hosidius
Gardener: Lammy Langle
  • Watson
  • Tithe Farm minigame
  • Allotment and flower/Herb patches
  • Charcoal furnace
  • Saltpetre
  • Sand Crabs
  • Mess
  • Forthos Dungeon
  • Skills necklace to Woodcutting Guild
  • Hosidius portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Xeric's talisman to Xeric's Glade
  • Tithe Farm Grouping teleport
Northern section of the Farming Guild
(85 Farming required)
Gardener: Latlink Fastbell
  • Farming Guild patches
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

''Gardener: [[Lammy Langle]] | *[[Watson]] *[[Tithe Farm]] [[Minigames|minigame]] *[[Farming/Patch locations#Allotment/Flower/Herb patches|Allotment and flower]]/[[Herb patch]]es *[[Charcoal furnace]] *[[Saltpetre]] *[[Sand Crab]]s *[[Mess]] *[[Forthos Dungeon]] | *[[Skills necklace]] to [[Woodcutting Guild]] *[[Hosidius]] portal: [[Teleport to House]] spell or [[scroll of redirection|redirected]] [[Teleport to house (tablet)|house tab]] *[[Xeric's talisman]] to [[Xeric's Glade]] *[[Tithe Farm]] [[Grouping teleport]] |[[File:Lammy Langle location.png|212px]] |- |Northern section of the [[Farming Guild]]
(85 Farming required)
